work.name: Aurora Innovation
work.summary: Aurora makes self-driving vehicle systems, specifically for frieght. Autonomy Simulation Team.

work.name: Allen Institute for AI (Ai2)
work.summary: Built a bimanual system of FR3 robotic arms. Developed keyboard-based teleoperation software using MoveIt motion planning & inverse kinematics in Python.

work.name: Personal Robotics Lab @ UW
work.summary: Tested imitation learning control algorithm (CCIL) on real 6-DOF robotic arm & simulation (F1Tenth, Drone, Mujoco, Metaworld). CCIL outperformed human and top algorithmic baselines in both real and simulated environments by 75%. Performed robot-learning research for fine manipulation on 6-DOF robotic arm and miniature autonomous vehicles.

education.studyType: Bachelors of Arts, Bachelors of Science

awards.title: 5x Dean's List
awards.summary: The University of Washington recognizes students after each academic quarter and year for their high scholarship award and inclusion on the corresponding Deanâ€™s List.

projects.name: Bimanual Teleop Software
projects.summary: Inverse kinematics-based teleoperation software for an Meta Quest 2 VR controller for a bimanual FRANKA arm system.

projects.name: Discover
projects.summary: All-in-one chest x-ray analysis, diagnosis, and catheter placement web application using AI. Developed an image classification and segmentation model (over 60M param) with TensorFlow, OpenCV, and PyTorch, trained on thousands of x-rays. Front-end built with Flask, Python, HTML/CSS. Won award in CodeDay Hackathon 2023.

projects.name: Human Image Masking (Segmentation)
projects.summary: Learned how to create a Image Seg model with U-NET architecture and developed and implemented the model to segment and mask human presence in images. Also learned data augmentation using Albumentations for training a better model.

projects.name: Mach 5 Robotics
projects.summary: Collaborated with peers to write teleop & auton code for 22-23 VEX high school competition.
